resources.string: My journey so far with Jetpack compose has been very insightful. Learning Jetpack Compose has shown me that base Android development had many more issues that I realised, and even through the short time we have been using Jetpack Compose I am clearly able to see its benefits and ease of use. I believe these few months we have been learning Jetpack Compose has been incredible helpful and useful for improving our overall skills at Android Development
